Find mean, sd, min, max for each of temperature and ozone level.

## Get the data
```{r}
data_airquality <- airquality
```

## Finding statistical information on 'Temp' data
```{r}
temp_stats <- c(
  mean_temp <- mean(data_airquality[["Temp"]], na.rm = TRUE),
  sd_temp <- sd(data_airquality[["Temp"]], na.rm = TRUE),
  min_temp <- min(data_airquality[["Temp"]], na.rm = TRUE),
  max_temp <- max(data_airquality[["Temp"]], na.rm = TRUE)
  )
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
print(temp_stats)
```

## Finding statistical information on 'Ozone' data
```{r}
ozone_stats <- c(
  mean_ozone <- mean(data_airquality[["Ozone"]], na.rm = TRUE),
  sd_ozone <- sd(data_airquality[["Ozone"]], na.rm = TRUE),
  min_ozone <- min(data_airquality[["Ozone"]], na.rm = TRUE),
  max_ozone <- max(data_airquality[["Ozone"]], na.rm = TRUE)
)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
print(ozone_stats)
```
